DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Version 1.0 Adult Physical Health Domain Interest in Sexual Activity SFINT103 Past 30 Days How Often Have Sexual Thoughts or Fantasies While Awake Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how often in the past 30 days they have had sexual thoughts or fantasies while they were awake, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Interest in Sexual Activity Past 30 Days How Often Have Sexual Thoughts or Fantasies While Awake Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess self-reported perceptions of interest in sexual activity in men and women._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about how often an individual has or had sexual fantasies while awake._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Interest in Sexual Activity Subordinate Domain
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.:The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess self-reported perceptions of interest in sexual activity in men and women.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

Concepts.longName: Interest in Sexual Activity Subordinate Domain
Concepts.definition: The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess self-reported perceptions of interest in sexual activity in men and women.

Property.preferredName: Past 30 Days How Often Have Sexual Thoughts or Fantasies While Awake Score

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.

Concepts.longName: How Often Have Sexual Thoughts or Fantasies While Awake
Concepts.definition: A question about how often an individual has or had sexual fantasies while awake.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: PROMIS:Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System, PROMIS Health Organization and PROMIS Cooperative Group, 2008-2012

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS items that describes a range of subjective scores for representing how often an individual experiences something from 1: Never, to 5: Always.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added "Sometimes" to represent the MSAS value domain.ghd.01.27.15

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

Concepts.definition: On many occasions, or in many situations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: At all times; on every occasion.

Concepts.definition: At all times; on every occasion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for ECOG-ACRIN study in Rave. mc 5/4/15
